data.description: Check your SpardaBank accounts from Perl
data.similar:
Finance::Bank::BNPParisbas, Finance::Bank::Postbank_de / search for
    Finance::Bank on cpan
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Up until today all the Finance::Bank modules are only named after
    their supported Banking Corporation - not the Country. Especially in
    "Old Europe" there are several countries with a "Postbank" so it
    would be better to name the modules Finance::Bank::<ISO
    COUNTRY>::<INSTITUTE>.

    I would like to do that for my upcoming module that supports German
    SpardaBank because there is at least in Austria a same called bank
    without any technical relationship with the German one.

    It would be nice to have a naming standard for that Bank modules.

    regards, Roland
